alert.note: Alert for Central Cook (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 2:59PM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Cook County through 345 PM CDT... At 258 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over La Grange, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and torrential rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... South side of Chicago, Cicero, Oak Lawn, Berwyn, Chicago Lawn, Englewood, Bridgeport, South Lawndale, South Shore, Midway Airport, Roseland, Burbank, Brookfield, La Grange, Justice, Summit, Burr Ridge, Ashburn, New City and Brighton Park. This includes...Brookfield Zoo, SeatGeek Stadium, University of Chicago, Hawthorne Park, Guaranteed Rate Field...IL Institute of Technology, and Museum of Science and Industry. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
